import React, { useContext } from 'react' import Context from "../Context" const Publicaciones = () => { const{tienda, setTienda} = useContext (Context); return ( <>
{tienda.filter((e)=>e.idUs).map((e) =>(
{e.name}
${(e.price).toLocaleString("es-Cl")}
))}
) } export default Publicaciones
